name: Baked Brie with Caramelized Onions
author: KMKLANG
summary: I got this recipe from my boyfriend's sister.  It is absolutely amazing, and very easy to do.  Spend a little bit of time preparing, and a lot of time enjoying! You can also garnish with candied walnuts.
ingredients: 1  Granny Smith apple - peeled, cored and sliced
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (205 degrees C)
Place garlic on a baking sheet, and drizzle with olive oil
Roast for 15 to 20 minutes, or until soft
Meanwhile, melt 1/4 cup butter in a skillet over medium heat
Cook and stir onion and apple in butter until tender and browned
Arrange brie on top of thawed puff pastry
Top the cheese with the apple and onion mixture
Fold puff pastry over the cheese, and pinch closed
Bake about 20 to 25 minutes, or until golden brown
Garnish with whole cloves of roasted garlic
